pr_title: [Exam] Fix missing exercises for exercise groups

timeline.message: Get exercise groups with exercises and make sure that no cycle error occurs during serialization

timeline.bodyText:
I think it would be better if you do the following instead and delete this method
In ExerciseGroup add the annotation to the exercises association
@JsonIgnoreProperties("exerciseGroup")
This is also how it works for the association between Course and Exercise
timeline.author: krusche
